docs.title: 📘 DBMS Notes
docs.text: Welcome to my Database Management Systems (DBMS) notes! This site is organized into 5 units with detailed topics and explanations.

docs.title: 📑 Units
docs.text:
• Unit 1 — Introduction to DBMS
  • Unit 2 — Relational Model
  • Unit 3 — SQL & Query Processing
  • Unit 4 — Transaction Management
  • Unit 5 — Database System Architectures

✨ Made by Aashritha Reddy

💡 Test Update: GitHub Actions deployment is working!

docs.title: What is a DBMS?
docs.text: A Database Management System (DBMS) is software that allows users to store, organize, and retrieve data efficiently.
